description.en:
**Description translated from the author:**
University graduate Mu Siyun sent his resume to the star fleet on a whim and somehow became the Fleet Admiral! This is the story about an admiral with a harem of 3000 female soldiers conquering the universe.

---

**Translator's version:**
The smartest university student to ever graduate from Daxia University's Department of Political History, Mu Siyun, enlists in Beiyang's Fleet on a whim and somehow becomes the Fleet Admiral. Knowing fully well how the world works and how the rich dominate the poor, Mu Siyun seeks to defy the heavens and bring order and hope back to the universe by cleverly scheming against his enemies.
description.ru: По прихоти судьбы выпускник университета Му Сыюнь отправил свое резюме в звёздный флот и каким-то образом стал адмиралом флота! Это история об адмирале с гаремом в 3000 женщин-солдат, покоряющих вселенную…
description.tr: Üniversiteden mezun olan Mu Siyun, bir heves ile öz geçmişini yıldız filosuna yollar ve her nasılsa filo amirali olur! bu hikaye 3000 kız askerin bir filo amiraliyle evreni ele geçirmesini anlatıyor…

title.en: Haitatsusaki no Onee-san ga Kowa Sugiru

altTitles.ja: 配達先のお姉さんが怖すぎる

altTitles.en: The Delivery Destination Onee-san Is Too Scary

altTitles.ja: 配達先のお姉さんが怖すぎる話

altTitles.ja-ro: Haitatsusaki no Onee-san ga Kowa Sugiru Hanashi
Haitatsu-saki no Onee-san ga Kowa Sugiru Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story of This Scary Consignee Girl
The Story of a Scary Consignee
The Delivery Destination Onee-san Is Too Scary Story

altTitles.es-la: La Historia de un destinatario aterrador

altTitles.vi: Câu chuyện về cô nàng nhận hàng đáng sợ

description.en: An introverted part-time food delivery guy working in the countryside receives a food delivery order. When he reaches the delivery address, he discovers that the recipient is a tall and intimidating-like woman. However, as the story unfolds, he eventually discovers…
description.es-la: Un introvertido repartidor de comida a tiempo parcial que trabaja en el campo recibe un pedido de comida a domicilio. Cuando llega a la dirección de entrega, descubre que la destinataria es una mujer alta y de aspecto intimidatorio. Sin embargo, a medida que avanza la historia, descubrirá que...

altTitles.ja: ふしぎねこのきゅーちゃん

description.en:
There’s more to this kitty than meets the eye! Kyuu-chan loves snacks, cuddles, and bow ties, but most of all loves Hinata, the young professional who adopted this mischievous wonder cat into his home.

As the two adjust to life together, they discover that they have a lot to learn from each other.

The ordinary and the extraordinary live side by side in this delightful slice-of-life manga!

---

- **[Official English license announcement](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/2020/08/28/seven-seas-isnt-kitten-around-with-license-of-wondercat-kyuu-chan-manga-series/)**

- **[ManiManiTV YouTube channel](https://www.youtube.com/c/ManiManiTV/videos/), Official Kyuu-chan motion comic videos:** [#1,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zCBZUbEbI-w) [#2,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wSJURvGO494) [#3](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ytJbXHsqikw)…
description.ro: O manga adorabilă color despre un tânăr ce salvează o pisică foarte specială. Dar pisica asta nu e ceea ce pare! Kyuu-chan iubeste mâncarea, îmbrățișările și fundele, dar cel mai mult, îl iubește pe Hinata, tânărul care l-a adoptat. Pe măsură ce se obișnuiesc să trăiască împreună, ei descoperă că au mult de învățat unul de la celălalt. Vedeți viața ordinară și extraordinară pe care cei doi o trăiesc în această minunată slice-of-life manga pentru toți iubitorii de animale și nu numai!
description.ru: Милая история о повседневной жизни бездомного котика Кю и человека, который решает его приютить.
description.pt-br: Hinata é um jovem trabalhador que leva uma vida mundana. No meio de uma tempestade de neve, ele acha um gato abandonado passando frio em uma caixa de papelão, e decide o levar pra casa. O que Hinata não sabia é que ele tinha acabado de pegar o melhor gato de todos!

altTitles.ja: 犬がヒトになる話

altTitles.ja-ro: Inu ga Hito ni Naru Hanashi

altTitles.zh-hk: 我家碰太變成了人類這件事

altTitles.ja: ポン太がヒトになりまして。

description.en:
A slapstick comedy that involves a town and its neighbors where “pet dogs” have become “humans”!
Feelings that couldn’t be conveyed as a dog can now be understood directly…!?
description.fr: Un jour, les chiens de cette ville sont soudainement devenus humains. L'histoire suit la vie de Saki et de son chien Ponta.
description.ru: В один прекрасный день домашние собаки в этом городе вдруг превращаются в людей. История рассказывает о жизни хозяйки Саки и ее собаки Понты.
description.uk: Одного разу всі собаки, які жили в цьому місті раптово перетворилися на людей. Історія розповідає про життя Сакі, власниці, та Понти, її пса.

description.en: A modern psychic accidentally travels through time and turns into an ancient princess. She and Zhen Qi Yao are in tears: Refusing arranged marriage! Unexpectedly, the black-bellied prince tells the truth about marrying her, just for her psychic skills! What does this man want to do?

Jiang Hao Yi, a normal high school student who is extremely scared of getting into trouble, suddenly becomes the Harem King of his school and gets confessed to by a bunch of beautiful girls! The worst thing is, Jiang Hao doesn't know any of the girls who confessed to him! What on earth is happening? This is a manhua that shouldn't be missed by fans of the harem genre!
description.pt-br: Jiang Hao Yi, um estudante normal do ensino médio que tem muito medo de se meter em problemas, de repente se torna o Rei Harem de sua escola e é confessado por um bando de lindas meninas! O pior é que Jiang Hao não conhece nenhuma das garotas que se confessaram a ele! Que diabos está acontecendo? Este é um manhua que não deve ser perdido pelos fãs do gênero harém!

description.en:
JaeSin was turned into an insignificant small creature and ousted to the human world for violating the law of causality and the only way he can go back to the underworld is to win a human’s love. He doesn’t believe in human emotions until he bumped into a crown prince, Nok, who’s been suffering from heartbreak for a long time. He then started getting curious about him…

“There you are. A fool with unrequited love.”
description.pl: Jako syn króla Yeomra z podziemnego świata, Jaeshin prowadził hedonistyczne życie pełne ciągle zmieniających się partnerów łóżkowych i protekcjonalności wobec ludzi. Pewnego dnia jednak przekracza granicę i zostaje ukarany w dość nietypowy sposób: w dzień staje się bezsilnym szczeniakiem, a w nocy człowiekiem. Jedynym sposobem na uniknięcie kary jest zdobycie ludzkiego serca, co nie będzie łatwe... zwłaszcza, gdy człowiekiem, na którego zwrócił uwagę, jest słodki książę Lee Nok. Czy Jaeshin zdobędzie księcia? A może to Jaeshin zostanie zdobyty?
description.uk: Ча Шин, котрий був вигнаним з власного світу за вчинення злочину, котрий порушив порядок життя та смерті. Його єдиний спосіб повернутись назад в підземний світ - завоювати людське серце. Перед Ча Шином, який не вірить у людську великодушність, постає спадкоємний принц Нок, у котрого розбите серце через невзаємне кохання. Демон починає цікавитись Ноком... Цікавий початок... Що ж буде далі?
description.es-la: Jae-shin, quien se convirtió en un criminal y fue expulsado de este mundo. Su única forma de regresar al inframundo es obteniendo un corazón humano. Frente a Jae-shin, que no cree en las emociones humanas, aparece el príncipe heredero Nok, que tiene un problema del corazón desde hace mucho tiempo, Jae-shin comienza a sentir curiosidad por la situación de Nok. "Hay un idiota que alberga un amor que no se puede cumplir.”

title.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

description.en:
A story about a ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

Kit never forgot her first love, Edwin. One day, she realized that Edwin had been sending some kind of signal for help. So she turned back time to the day when he was still alive. Edwin had given up on his life and only waited for his death to come. But when Kit pleaded for his life, his frozen heart thawed a little.

“Let’s move forward, but this time we will escape death,” she said, “You are not alone. We will do this together.”

Their affections for each other grew more as they battled against death. However, there was a dark energy of an inevitable doom that hovered between them….

“Your presence. You being alive is all that matters to me,” she said.

The moment they meet each other over time, their love becomes a stronger reality.

altTitles.ja: ケントゥリア

description.en: Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?! Embark on a groundbreaking journey through this action-packed dark fantasy saga!!

altTitles.ja: はるかリセット

description.en: Haruka is a writer who is overwhelmed by deadlines and takes time out of her busy schedule to reset her mind. Strolling around the neighborhood, soaking in the public bath, eating the local cuisine, enjoying the park... even though she can’t take a big vacation or travel far, she’s determined to still enjoy any little “vacation” she can by getting creative!
description.ja: 締め切りに追われる作家のはるかが、忙しい毎日の合間を縫ってわずかな時間で気持ちをリセット。ご近所散策、銭湯、近場グルメ、公園満喫…まとまった休みが取れなくても、遠くへ旅行に行けなくても、少しの発想の切り替えで、ワクワクできる「休み」は満喫できる! 休みが足りないすべての人に、はるかがステキな休日を贈ります!

altTitles.en: The Confession of the Demon King

altTitles.vi: Lời Thú Nhận Của Chúa Tể Bóng Tối

description.en:
The 'curse' left by the demon king a thousand years ago turns people into magicians. Lapis dreams of becoming a paladin while hiding her identity as a magician. One day, she accidentally summoned the demon king 'Kara'!

The demon king will remove the curse if she helps him, but... Wait, this Demon King's confession is unusual?!

Chasing the stars, Lapis approaches the truth of a thousand years ago.

---
**Alternate raws source:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8367809)
description.pt-br: O que acontece se você invocar o Rei Demônio, o maior inimigo de todo o continente? Devido a uma batalha que ocorreu há mais de mil anos, as pessoas amaldiçoadas tornam-se magos demoníacos, e aqueles que são abençoados tornam-se cavaleiros sagrados que protegem o reino. Lapis, que esconde sua identidade de maga e aspira ser uma cavaleira sagrada, acidentalmente acaba invocando o Rei Demônio. Junto com a confissão intrigante do Rei Demônio, começa a jornada de Lapis para se tornar um cavaleiro sagrado!

description.en: Love and misunderstandings

altTitles.ja: 嵐とスノードロップ

altTitles.vi: Bão Tố Và Hoa Tuyết Điểm

description.en:
Taikuni was a promising basketball player, but after injuring his leg, he quit the basketball club and entered the spring of his third year feeling somewhat lethargic.

Amidst all this, he is appointed to the class beautification committee along with Haruki, a boy who is a bit of a shadow due to his frail health. Gradually, Taikuni finds himself unable to leave Haruki, who seems somewhat otherworldly and unsafe, alone...

A heart-cleansing story of first love told by two high school boys!

title.en: Genjitsu Sekai (Real) Demo Shiawase ni Shite Kudasai ne?

altTitles.ja: 現実世界（リアル）でも幸せにしてくださいね？

altTitles.es-la: Sé feliz también en el mundo real, ¿de acuerdo?

altTitles.en: Be Happy in the Real World Too, Okay?

altTitles.ja-ro: Genjitsu Sekai Demo Shiawase ni Shite Kudasai ne?
Genjitsu Sekai (Real) Demo Shiawase ni Shite Kudasai ne?

description.en:
High school student Machino, who longs for the 'love of destiny', encounters the dating simulation game 'Celestia'. Despite having maximized affection with all the heroines, she can't decide on just one, leading her to spend days of anguish unable to advance to the confession event. At that moment, an explosion along with a shooting star occurs in her house, and when she opens her eyes, she meets the main heroine of 'Celestia', Sofia....

"Machino... I always wanted to say it... I like you."

The otherworldly harem summoning romantic comedy begins with the highly affectionate heroines who have jumped into the real world!
description.es-la:
La estudiante de secundaria, Machino, que anhela el 'amor del destino', se encuentra con el juego de simulación de citas 'Celestia'. A pesar de haber aumentado al máximo la simpatía de todas las heroínas, no puede decidirse por una sola, lo que la lleva a pasar días de angustia sin poder avanzar al evento de confesión. En ese momento, una explosión junto con una estrella fugaz ocurre en su casa, y cuando abre los ojos, se encuentra con la heroína principal de 'Celestia', Sofía...

"Machino... siempre quise decirlo... me gustas."

¡La comedia romántica de harén de invocación a otro mundo comienza con las heroínas de alta simpatía que han saltado al mundo real!

title.en: Inscrutable Are the Ways of Heaven

altTitles.ja: 人間万事塞翁が馬

description.en:
A romance between an introverted employee and an extroverted part-timer at a drugstore.

Bashouguchi, a dead inside drugstore employee, has her life turned upside-down by the new part-timer Kimura, whose flashy looks clash with the clean image of the store.

And it turns out that Kimura has actually had a one-night stand with her?!

Kimura threatens Bashouguchi and sexually harasses her, but she's also her savior since she covers a lot of shifts. This is a yuri about how all of this changes something in the timid Bashouguchi... perhaps.
description.ja:
ドラッグストア陽キャバイト×陰キャ社員百合。

ドラッグストアのくだびれた陰キャ社員・芭蕉口（バショウグチ）のもとに、店のクリーンなイメージにそぐわない見た目でやってきた陽キャバイト・木村（キムラ）。
その木村、実は芭蕉口のワンナイトの相手だった！？
脅してくるしセクハラしてくるけどシフトを埋めてくれる救世主の木村によって、臆病な芭蕉口の何かが変わる……かもしれない百合。

altTitles.en: Scary Face High Schooler and Miss Plain Jane
Scary-Faced High Schooler and Miss Plain Jane

altTitles.ja: コワモテ高校生と地味子さん

description.en:
“I’ve come back for you.” The handsome boy who moved away ten years ago has returned… with a super scary face?!  
  
Sachi, the 26 year-old manager of a little florist shop, was closing up when suddenly a high schooler with a terrifying face approached saying, “I came as promised.”   
  
The manly and earnest high schooler with a terrifying face X the super dull plain jane, in a heart bursting love story! ♥   
 <Translated from comic.pixvi>

altTitles.ja: パンをナメるな！
パンナメ

description.en:
No education, no work experience, no friends.
Muyu Uchiki is a nineteen-year old girl who's been a shut-in for two years, she lives a self-indulgent life, but a turning point comes for her?!
She gets a call from her aunt in Kamakura about helping out at her bakery.
A heartwarming comedy about a girl struggling in a bakery in Kamakura!

altTitles.ja: みゆちゃんはずっと友達

altTitles.en: Miyu-chan Will Always Be Your Friend

description.en: In the summer of his second year of high school, Yuushin Tahara finds that his childhood friend, Miyu Fukagawa, who had moved away, has returned to the house next door. Although Miyu has grown up to be quite cute, there's something a little strange about her...
description.es: En el verano de su segundo año de instituto, su amiga de la infancia Miyu Fukagawa vuelve a la casa de al lado del protagonista, Yuushin Tahara, después de haberse separado cuando se mudó. Miyu-chan ha crecido y se ha vuelto mucho más guapa, pero hay algo un poco extraño en ella...? Se trata de una comedia de suspenso y amor con una nueva sensación, en la que el demasiado amable protagonista y su simpática pero muy divertida amiga de la infancia ¡se desenvuelven con sus amigos!
description.ja: 高校2年生の夏、主人公・田原優心の隣の家に、引っ越しで別れてしまった幼馴染・深川みゆちゃんが帰ってきた。すっかり大きく可愛くなったみゆちゃんだけど、どこかちょっとヘンで…？
description.es-la: En el verano de su segundo año de instituto, su amiga de la infancia Miyu Fukagawa vuelve a la casa de al lado del protagonista, Yuushin Tahara, después de haberse separado cuando se mudó. Miyu-chan ha crecido y se ha vuelto mucho más guapa, pero hay algo un poco extraño en ella...? Se trata de una comedia de suspenso y amor con una nueva sensación, en la que el demasiado amable protagonista y su simpática pero muy divertida amiga de la infancia ¡se desenvuelven con sus amigos!
description.pt-br:
No verão do seu segundo ano do ensino médio, Tahara Yuushin descobre que sua amiga de infância, Fukagawa Miyu, que havia se mudado, retornou para a casa ao lado. Embora Miyu tenha se tornado uma garota bastante fofa, há algo um pouco estranho sobre ela...

Uma comédia romântica com toques de suspense, centrada em um protagonista gentil e sua amiga de infância adorável, porém um tanto excêntrica.

altTitles.en: Star in the daytime / Star in daytime
The Star that Rises in the Day

altTitles.ja: 昼間に輝く星

description.en:
Yura Hwang is an actress who only gets to act as an extra for all seven years since she started her career. She got betrayed by her boyfriend that got married to another person. But in all that mess, she met again with the famous senior actor for the second time in her newest movie! Will her path to becoming a star come true?

Original webtoon:
[Official Korean version - Kakao](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=55452896)
[Official Korean version - Lezhin](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/stars_rise_day)

[Official German Version](https://www.webtoons.com/de/romance/daytime-star/list?title_no=4371)
[Official Indonesian Version](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romance/daytime-star/list?title_no=3503)
[Official Japanese Version](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001766&t=1656696267720)
[Official Spanish Version](https://www.webtoons.com/es/romance/daytime-star/list?title_no=4042)
[Official S.Chinese Version](https://www.podoteng.com)
[Official T.Chinese Version](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/romance/daytime-star/list?title_no=3962)
[Official Thai Version](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romance/daytime-star/list?title_no=4349)
description.pl: Yura Hwang, aktorka, która przez siedem lat, odkąd rozpoczęła karierę, występuje tylko jako statystka. Została zdradzona przez swojego chłopaka, który wziął ślub z inną dziewczyną. W całym tym chaosie, udało jej się spotkać ze słynnym aktorem w swoim najnowszym filmie! Czy jej droga do zostania gwiazdą się spełni?

altTitles.ja: ラストマン

description.en:
A mysterious boy lies naked and unconscious on the street. The story begins when ninth grader, Ai Oomori, and his third grader brother, Seigi, find him. This boy has no memory of the past and doesn't even know his real name. He is like a little baby. Ai names this boy Makoto and takes him back home. Makoto has superhuman physical powers and can even recover quickly from injuries. Who is Makoto? Makoto is easygoing and not at all bothered by everyone's curiosity. Until that is he is pursued by a cruel woman who disguises herself as a spider. A neo sapiens, this spider woman has been dispatched by a mystery organization called, "Love & Peace." Her mission is to bring back Makoto dead or alive.  
  
Source: MU

altTitles.ja: 晴れ晴れ日和

description.en: One day at a funeral, after Chiharu's mother remarried, Chiharu met the child from her new stepfather's previous marriage, Rui. Rui decided to live on her own after the death of the grandfather who raised her, and Chiharu decided to live with her. A tale of togetherness of two stepsisters.
description.ja: ある日、母親から再婚を告げられた千晴は相手の連れ子のルイと葬式で出会う。育ての親の祖父を亡くしてひとりで生きると決めたルイと、そんなルイと一緒に暮らすことを決めた千晴。

description.en: "Tales of Greed" is back with an even deeper story! What if the desires that every human can have become a reality? Will the outcome ultimately lead to happiness or bring about destruction?
description.id: 'Diary of Desire' kini kembali dengan cerita yang lebih deep! Bagaimana jika keinginan yang bisa dimiliki oleh setiap manusia menjadi kenyataan? Apakah akhirnya akan bahagia atau malah membawa kehancuran?
description.ko:
더욱 더 매운맛으로 돌아온 욕망일기의 새로운 에피소드
인간이라면 누구나 가질법한 욕망,
그것이 현실로 이루어진다면?
그 끝은 과연 행복일까 파멸일까..

description.en: Even angels give into temptation. Once God’s right-hand warrior, the archangel Agnes has succumbed to desire and formed a contract with Lucifer, the ruler of demons. Now a fallen angel, she poses as a simple taxi driver and patrols the bustling city of Seoul during the midnight hours. Cursed by the king of hell to seek souls for her life force, Agnes pursues depraved individuals who prey upon innocents for their own pleasure, and uses their carnal desires against them. But when her past comes back to haunt her, a tantalizing game of cat and mouse involving vengeful entities ensues.

altTitles.ja: バスタード

description.de:
Da ist ein Serienmörder in meinem Haus!

---
Was würdest du tun, wenn du von klein auf unbeabsichtigt der Komplize deines Vaters bist, der sich als Serienmörder entpuppt? Das ist genau das Dilemma, in dem Jin Seon steckt -- kann er es schaffen, sich gegen seinen eigenen Vater zu behaupten?
description.en:
"There is a murderer living with me."  
Generation discord thriller.
description.es: ¡Hay un asesino serial en mi casa!
description.fr: Il y a un tueur en série dans ma maison!
description.id: Pembunuhan berantai dengan korban para wanita tak berdosa sedang terjadi! Meski kelihatan lemah dan sakit-sakitan, hanya Jin lah yang mengetahui siapa pembunuh misterius itu. Monster macam apa yang begitu keji pada korbannya?
description.ru:
«В моем доме серийный убийца!»  
  
паренек со слабым здоровьем, находящийся на нижней ступени школьной иерархии, но он не так прост, каким кажется на первый взгляд.  
  
 [Official Japanese](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000195)
description.th: มีฆาตกรต่อเนื่องอยู่ในบ้านของฉัน!
description.zh:
“我的家里住着一个杀人魔。” 
父子代沟的残忍恐怖故事正式拉开帷幕！
description.pt-br: Tem um serial killer na minha casa.
description.zh-hk: “我的家里住著一個殺人魔” 父子代溝的殘忍恐怖故事正式拉開帷幕！

description.en:
Shin Jae-Won attended the World Camp hosted by the Spanish King as a tennis player in his Junior Year.  
  
Jae-Won meets Javier, an unusually conspicuous participant in the World Camp.  
  
“When are we going to practice?”  
  
There are always people (especially women) around him.  
  
Then, Jae-Won, who happened to stumble upon Javier one night during practice, ended up spending the night alone. The more he faced his whimsical, pure side, the more his heart began to beat…  
  
“I hate this kind of things…”  
  
Jae-Won’s first love ended as fast as a Siesta.  
  
A decade later, they meet again Spain.

title.en: Imaizumin Chi wa Douyara Gal no Tamariba ni Natteru Rashii~DEEP~

altTitles.ja: 今泉ん家はどうやらギャルの溜まり場になってるらしい～DEEP～

altTitles.en: Imaizumin's House is a Place for Gals to Gather
Imaizumin's House is a Hangout Place for Gals

altTitles.ja-ro: Imaizumin Chie wa Dōyara Gyaru no Tamariba ni Natterurashī

altTitles.id: Rumah Imaizumi adalah Tempat Nongkrong Para Cewek
Rumah Imaizumi adalah Tempat Nongkrong Cabe-cabean
Rumah Imaizumi adalah Tempat Nongkrong Gal

altTitles.en: Imaizumi Brings All the Gals to His House

description.en: Imaizumi is a high school boy who lives alone in his apartment for a reason. He has a secret that he can't tell to anyone. And the secret is that he lives with the top three Gyarus (gals) of his school, Hamasaki, Kurumozaka, and Sasaki. He spends his day playing, talking and getting physical with these Gyarus, all of whom have a quirk or two. Imaizumi-kun is getting more and more addicted to his lazy, naughty and free "youth"...?
description.id: Imaizumi-kun, seorang siswa SMA yang hidup sendiri karena suatu alasan. Dia memiliki rahasia yang tidak bisa diketahui oleh siapa pun. Yaitu tinggal bersama tiga gadis "Hamasaki", "Kurumizaka" dan "Sasaki" yang berada di kasta atas di sekolah.

description.en: After being murdered and reborn, An Zhi vowed to take revenge on the scumbag and the bitch, but accidentally "tarnished" the innocence of Pei Que, a banished immortal in the capital. An Zhi felt ashamed because Pei Que was not only handsome, but she also called him fourth uncle in her previous life. Until one day, An Zhi accidentally discovered his secret. It turned out that he had been plotting against her for a long time, and his previous kindness was a sweet trap for him to keep her captive.

altTitles.ja: アンデッドアンラック
アンデッドアンラック カラー版

altTitles.vi: Bất tử và bất hạnh (Bản màu)

description.en: Fuuko is an UNLUCKY girl that causes bad luck to anyone she touches. As she prepares to face her death, Andy, an UNDEAD who desperately wants to die appears before her! Realizing her potential, he decides to use Fuuko's power to gives himself a permanent death, but then a certain organization goes after them…

“Hye-seong,” a boy living on a remote island, meets “Yoon-hae,” a mermaid he met in the sea, and they become each other’s only friends. However, the two soon break up against each other due to Hye-seong’s move. Six years later, Yunhae gains mysterious abilities and returns to Comet. However, many things have changed for Hyesung to spend all his time with Yunhae like he did when he was young. “I’m a different person than you, Yoonhae.” Yoon Hae's attachment to the comet is slowly spreading into control... The winner of the 2nd largest contest on earth in 2022.

altTitles.ja: イセイカイテンセイ
異星界転星

description.en:
Noah, the last survivor from Earth, aims for a new universe on the spaceship that was handed down to him by his mother who was a scientist. What he arrives at is a planet where living things possess magic. When he is out doing field work, he meets a girl who proclaims herself as the demon lord's daughter.  
  
The cyborg youth will traverse a planet full of mysteries in this iseikai sci-fi fantasy.

title.en: Private Life is Theirs Alone. Celebrity x Yuri Anthology

altTitles.ja: プライベートは本人たちに任せております。芸能人×百合アンソロジー

altTitles.ja-ro: Private wa Honnin-tachi ni Makasete Orimasu. Geinoujin x Yuri Anthology

altTitles.en: Private Life is Left to Them. Talent x Yuri Anthology

description.en:
Bei Yao, a cheerful four-year-old, was reborn into 1996 and found herself living next door to a boy destined to become a formidable villain in the future. This boy, Pei Chuan, was only five at the time, confined to a wheelchair and deeply insecure.

Years later, when they were teenagers, Bei Yao had blossomed into the school's most admired beauty. Despite her popularity, Pei Chuan remained guarded and distant. When Bei Yao confessed her feelings for him, he reacted with a mixture of fear and longing.

Having known each other for two lifetimes, Bei Yao was determined to understand the complexities of Pei Chuan's character. As their bond deepened, she discovered a sensitive and vulnerable soul beneath his tough exterior. Their story is one of a healing love that blossoms between childhood sweethearts, as Bei Yao's warmth gradually melts away Pei Chuan's emotional barriers.

altTitles.en: How to train your brainrot girlfriend

altTitles.es-la: Tengo una novia con la percepción de la realidad alterada

altTitles.tl: Paano Sanayin ang Iyong Jowang Utakbulok

altTitles.vi: Bạn gái bại não của tôi

description.en: Brainrot Girlfriend

altTitles.th: ยอดนักสืบจิ๋ว โคนัน

altTitles.ja: 名探偵コナン

description.en: Shinichi Kudo is a high school detective who sometimes works with the police to solve cases. During an investigation, he is attacked by members of a crime syndicate known as the Black Organization. They force him to ingest an experimental poison, but instead of killing him, the poison transforms him into a child. Adopting the pseudonym Conan Edogawa and keeping his true identity a secret, Kudo lives with his childhood friend Ran and her father Kogoro, who is a private detective.

altTitles.ja: かんたべりーでいず！

description.en: An official slice of life themed 4 panel webmanga of the Guardian Tales series.

altTitles.ja: ゴールデンカムイ カラー版

description.en: A tale of high adventure and survival on the Japanese frontier!   In the early twentieth century, Russo-Japanese War veteran Saichi Sugimoto searches the wilderness of the Japanese frontier of Hokkaido for a hoard of hidden gold. With only a cryptic map and a native Ainu girl to help him, Saichi must also deal with every murderous cutthroat, bandit and rogue who knows about the treasure!

title.en: The Secrets of the Lovely Duchess

description.en:
Luclia is a girl who was trapped in the demon archduke's dungeon for seven years and saw ghosts. One day the prison wall collapsed and a man came.

"Wow! are you a prince?"
"Sorry, I'm just a duke."

Davier, Duke of the House of Montenfeltro. Sure enough, with his temperamental and violent personality, he would take Luclia, an unknown girl, as his princess?!

"Duke, I wonder why you brought her here..."

Luclia, who has just entered the word with the mysterious Duke Davier. Can two people understand each other and still be happy?

Mooyoung spent his childhood under his stepfather’s oppressive rule, a life that felt like living in hell. A mysterious voice in the living hell showed him the way to survive. “Live someone else’s life instead of yours.” That’s how his acting journey began… Was it a survival instinct? Even when he did well, he excelled too much. Through acting, Mooyoung gained a new life. This is the story of Mooyoung, the overwhelming acting genius, embarking on a challenge in the entertainment industry!

The noble prince falls in love with a humble commoner! A confinement of possession begins, like the game of cat and mouse… But you can't stop love, a soft bite, is my property.

---

Official English: [WebComics](http://www.webcomicsapp.com/comic/5f2bd8e88c252b2eb429683a), [MangaToon](https://mangatoon.mobi/en/detail/599375), [Pocket Comics](https://www.comico.io/pocket-comics)  
Official: [Japanese](https://www.comico.jp/articleList.nhn?titleNo=29866), [Vietnamese](https://www.comico.vn/title/124)

altTitles.ja-ro: Dungeon Battle Royale ~Maou ni Nattanode Sekai Touitsu wo Mezashimasu~

altTitles.ja: ダンジョンバトルロワイヤル
ダンジョンバトルロワイヤル〜魔王になったので世界統一を目指します〜

description.en: Firstly, let’s look at the circumstances. It’s the year 20XX— god has decided to take on a world relieving project where all of the population had to take a survey. The result, a demon lord was created, as well as another world. Only a few months remain until the adventurers are released. The game’s participants are chosen, if they are lawful or chaotic. The lawful will stay in their normal world, while the chaotic are taken to another world, forced to kill a demon lord. Will they be able to take the path, to take down the demon lord!!

altTitles.ja: ナノ魔神

description.en:
After being held in disdain and having his life put in danger, an orphan from the Demonic Cult, Cheon Yeo-Woon, has an unexpected visit from his descendant from the future who inserts a nano machine into Cheon Yeo-Woon's body, which drastically changes Cheon Yeo-Woon's life after its activation. The story of Cheon Yeo-Woon's journey of bypassing the Demonic Cult and rising to become the best martial artist has just begun.

description.id:
Setelah mengalami cobaan berat pada hidupnya, Tiba tiba Chun yeowun mendapatkan pertolongan tidak terduga dari keturunannya di masa depan yang memasukkan teknologi nano ke dalam tubuhnya! Mampukah Chun Yeowun menjadi master bela diri dengan menggunakan kekuatan nano mashin!?

description.ja:
「未来の力を手に入れ、邪悪な魔教に立ち向かう！」 魔教の私生児として生まれた主人公・天黎雲。 幼い頃から卑しまれ、後継者争いで命を狙われる。 死に物狂いの抵抗もむなしく、危うく命を落としかねない絶体絶命のピンチに･･･！ その瞬間、突如現れた謎の男から「ナノマシン」と呼ばれる未来の力を注入され、 目覚めるととてつもない力を手に入れていた。 魔教を超え、最強の武人を目指す天黎雲の物語が幕を開ける！

갖은 멸시와 목숨의 위협을 받던 마교의 사생아 천여운, 
미래에서 나타난 후손이 천여운의 몸에 나노 머신을 주입한 후 그의 인생이 송두리째 바뀐다.
마교를 넘어 무림 최고의 자리에 오르기 위한 천여운의 거침없는 이야기가 시작된다!

description.ru:
Чен Еун — незаконнорожденный принц, появившийся на свет без единой частички Нейгуна. С самого раннего детства он находился под гнетом всеобщего отвращения. Весь забитый, с отсутствием какой-либо мотивации, год за годом Еун влачил свое жалкое существование. Ни на что не рассчитывая... и не претендуя.

Будучи изгоем, исконно презираемым шестью великими кланами, в один прекрасный день он оказался в окружении десятка подосланных убийц. Когда глаза практически застлала пелена белого света... и казалось, он уже начал теряться, проваливаясь в пучину... безграничного отчаяния, на горизонте возникла еле заметная фигура.

Неизвестный "потомок", снизошедший из будущего, в мгновение ока уничтожил всех врагов. Прошептав нечто невнятное, он подсадил в тело нашего героя какой-то странный предмет... наномашину. С этого момента все кардинально переменилось. Поселившийся где-то внутри искусственный интеллект дал его жизни невероятный толчок.

Больше не будет как прежде. Это... новая ветвь истории. Истории о парне, который бросил вызов небесам.

魔教私生子天如运饱受蔑视和生命威胁，某天来自未来的后人突然出现，给天如运的身体注入了纳米机器，从此他的人生发生了翻天覆地的变化。

A história da jornada de Cheon Yeo-Woon no culto demoníaco e sua subida para se tornar o melhor nas artes marciais acabou de começar.

title.ja: Backstabbed in a Backwater Dungeon: My Party Tried to Kill Me, But Thanks to an Infinite Gacha I Got LVL 9999 Friends and Am Out For Revenge

altTitles.ja-ro: Shinjiteita Nakama Tachi Ni Dungeon Okuchi De Korosare Kaketa ga Gift 『Mugen Gacha』 De Level 9999 No Nakama Tachi Wo Te Ni Irete Moto Party Member To Sekai Ni Fukushu & 『Zamaa!』 Shimasu!

altTitles.ja: 信じていた仲間達にダンジョン奥地で殺されかけたがギフト『無限ガチャ』でレベル9999の仲間達を手に入れて元パーティーメンバーと世界に復讐&『ざまぁ!』します!

altTitles.ja-ro: Shinjiteita Nakamatachi ni Dungeon Ouchi de Korosarekaketa ga Gift "Mugen Gacha" de Level 9999 no Nakamatachi wo Te ni Irete Moto Party Member to Sekai ni Fukushuu & "Zamaa!" Shimasu!

altTitles.en: Backwater Dungeon: My Party Tried to Kill Me, But Thanks to an Infinite Gacha I Got LVL 9999 Friends and Am Out For Revenge

I Was Almost Killed By The Teammates I trust Inside A Dungeon, And Gained A Gift Called [Infinite Gacha] And Level 9999 Comrades, And Now I'll Take Revenge Against My Former Teammates And The World, That's What You Get!
Backstabbed in a Backwater Dungeon: My Party Tried to Kill Me, But Thanks to an Infinite Gacha I Got LVL 9999 Friends and Am Out For Revenge

description.en:
There are six races in this world: human, beast, dragon, elf, dwarf, and demon. Humans are discriminated against and looked down on as the most inferior race. The "Gathering of Races" was a party with members from each race gathered to dispel such discrimination, but they also had a hidden purpose. They were ordered by the non-human countries to search for the human "Master," and take it to their own country.

Light, a human boy with the gift "Infinite Gacha," was welcomed into the Gathering of Races as he was suspected of being a Master. But in the end, their investigation showed that Light was not a Master. Just as Light was about to be killed by his teammates, he accidentally stepped on a transfer trap and was teleported to the lowest level of the dungeon.

In the deepest dungeon, he was attacked by a mythical level 1000 demon. In a desperate situation, Light used "Infinite Gacha" repeatedly. Luckily, he draws the SUR level 9999 card "Mei the Seeker Maid." Mei helped Light repel the demons and saved his life.

After finally escaping from the crisis, Light decides to take revenge on his former comrades. Mei advises him to remain in the dungeon and use Infinite Gacha to increase his number of trustworthy friends. Light agreed began building up the power necessary to oppose the non-human nations.

Three years later, Light had built the strongest nation in the depths of the dungeon. Once again, he will return to the surface to take revenge on his former comrades and search for the truth that nearly killed him.
___
[Alt Official English (US ONLY)](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10040/episode/345702)
description.ja:
仲間に裏切られ、最凶のダンジョン『奈落』の底に突き落とされた少年・ライト。彼に残されたのはゴミだと思われたスキル『無限ガチャ』のみ！　最悪な状況から少年の逆転劇が始まる!!!　

9つの種族の平等を掲げ結成された冒険者パーティー『種族の集い』。荷物持ちの少年・ライトは、パーティーの仲間達に裏切られ最凶ダンジョン『奈落』の奥で命を狙われる…。絶体絶命の危機、ライトがすがるのは恩恵『無限ガチャ』!!!
description.pt-br: Um menino chamado Light é traído por seus companheiros e mergulha no abismo da masmorra mais perigosa do mundo. Tudo o que ele têm é a Bênção (habilidade) "Gacha Infinita", que ele pensou ser um lixo! Começa a vingança de um garoto na pior situação possível!

description.en: Even if a musician dies, he never dies. It's just covered. Singer-songwriter Kim Han-seok, who became a legend in Korea with just a guitar... Waking up as a college student in the streaming era 30 years after his death!

A place where you casually use blood or ma in your name, I lived in Murim for 7 years. I was miserable, and I did a lot of dirty things. But I had to do anything to survive. That's 'Nangin' Finally, I crossed the line and experienced death in a desire to become stronger. But when I opened my eyes, it was modern. The world has changed and we are connected to the fantasy world of Pangea?! And as a returner with the only class? Let's scratch the lottery tickets!
description.id: Tempat di mana Anda dengan santai menggunakan darah atau ma atas nama Anda, saya tinggal di Murim selama 7 tahun. Saya sengsara, dan saya melakukan banyak hal kotor. Tapi aku harus melakukan apapun untuk bertahan hidup. Itulah 'Nangin' Akhirnya, saya melewati batas dan mengalami kematian dalam keinginan untuk menjadi lebih kuat. Tapi ketika saya membuka mata saya, itu modern. Dunia telah berubah dan kita terhubung dengan dunia fantasi Pangaea?! Dan sebagai pengembalian dengan satu-satunya kelas? Mari gores tiket lotere!

title.en: Potion wa 160 km/h de Nageru Mono! ~Item-gakari no Ore ga Bannou Kaifukuyaku o Touteki suru Koto de Saikyou no Boukensha ni Nariagaru!?~ @COMIC

Throwing Potions at 160km/h! I Will Become the Strongest Adventurer by Throwing a Universal Recovery Medicine!? @COMIC

description.en:
Vino, a member of the A-class adventurer party "Assault," is a potion user, the weakest and lowest level job.

He meets a beautiful swordsman named Canadia, who is known as the God of Death.
He was kicked out of the party and nearly died in a monster attack, but Vino awakened by chance with the single-minded desire to protect her!

He discovered his own strong shoulders and a new way to use potions, even throwing potions to blast monsters to pieces.

Then their adventure began, but at the same time Canadia started to run amok!

An adventure tale with the strongest pushover wife, it begins!

---

**Character Designer:** [Nitaka](https://mangadex.org/author/80544dac-562c-47ec-abb8-35f07ec2bd12)

[Alt Official Raw (NicoNico Manga)](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/54976)
description.ja:
Ａ級冒険者パーティ【アサルト】のメンバー・ヴィーノは、最弱にして最底辺職であるポーション使い。

そんな彼が出会ったのは『死神』と呼ばれる美しい剣士カナディアだった。
パーティから追い出され、モンスターの襲撃で死にかけたヴィーノが彼女を守りたい一心で偶然覚醒！

ポーションを投げてモンスターを爆散させるほどの自らの強肩ぶりと、ポーションの新たな使用法に気付く。

それから二人の冒険が始まったのだが……同時にカナディアの暴走も始まってしまう！？
最強の押しかけ嫁と行く冒険譚、開幕！

title.en: I Became the Youngest Member of Top Idol

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Retorno Como O Membro Mais Jovem

description.en: “25…that’s too old to become an idol.” Do Seohan, who got eliminated from the successful idol survival audition program ‘Stardust Project’. Giving up his dreams, he is trying to find his way working part-time jobs. When all of a sudden, he wakes up 8 years in the past after an accident. Right before the ‘Stardust Project’ started! As the youngest (but most experienced), can he make it to the final lineup this time?
description.id: Do Seohan, yang gagal dalam idol survival show terkenal “Stardust Project”, selalu dibayang-bayangi oleh mimpi masa lalunya. Tak pernah meraih kesuksesan, Seohan hanya bisa bekerja sambilan untuk melewati hari-harinya. Namun, akibat sebuah kejadian yang menimpanya, tiba-tiba ia terbangun dan kembali ke 8 tahun lalu, tepat sebelum “Stardust Project” dimulai! Jiwanya 8 tahun lebih tua dari kontestan lainnya, tapi sekarang ia yang termuda di antara mereka. Apakah kali ini Seohan akan berhasil debut sebagai idol?
description.ko:
"25살…그거 아이돌은 못하는 나이잖아요."
유명 서바이벌 아이돌 오디션 '스타더스트 프로젝트'에서 탈락했던 도서한.
꿈에 미련은 못버리고 현실과 타협한 채 알바를 전전하는데…눈을 떠보니 8년 전으로 돌아왔다.
그것도 '스타더스트 프로젝트'를 시작하기 직전으로!
막내가 된 (영혼만은) 최고 연장자, 이번에는 오디션에 합격해 아이돌 멤버가 될 수 있을까?
description.pt-br: Do Seohan, que fracassou no famoso programa de sobrevivência de idols "Stardust Project", é sempre assombrado por seus sonhos do passado. Sem nunca ter alcançado o sucesso, Seohan só consegue trabalhar em empregos de meio período para passar seus dias. No entanto, devido a um incidente que lhe aconteceu, ele acordou de repente e voltou a 8 anos atrás, logo antes do início do "Stardust Project"! Sua alma é 8 anos mais velha que a dos outros participantes, mas agora ele é o mais jovem entre eles. Será que Seohan conseguirá debutar como idol desta vez?

description.en:
ALL CHARACTERS AND EVENTS IN THIS MANGA—EVEN THOSE BASED ON THE ORIGINAL 4KOMA—ARE ENTIRELY FICTIONAL. EVERY CHAPTER IS MADE FROM EDITING THE ORIGINAL KYUU-CHAN… POORLY. THE FOLLOWING PARODY CONTAINS JUVENILE HUMOR AND BOOMER REFERENCES AND DUE TO ITS CONTENT IT SHOULD NOT BE VIEWED BY ANYONE  
  
i dont own kyuu chan, nor the original scanlations. all i own are my own ideas and concepts, most of which are stolen from other franchises  
  


---
description.ja:
/ 日本語  
||このマンガのすべてのキャラクターとイベントは、オリジナルの4コマに基づくものであっても、完全に架空のものです。すべての章は、元の九尾ちゃんの編集から作られています…次のパロディは少年のユーモアを含んでおり、そのコンテンツのため、誰からも見られるべきではありません||

title.en: Together With the Gods of Music

description.en:
A producer who had no talent but wanted to make it as a singer.
Death came on what he thought was his last chance, but the music gods didn't turn their backs on him.

-If the music gods don't abandon you, can you really do it?

With the gods of music, change began.
description.ko:
재능은 없지만 가수로 성공하고 싶었던 프로듀서.
마지막 기회라고 생각했던 날 찾아온 죽음, 그러나 음악의 신들은 그를 외면하지 않았다.

-음악의 신들이 너를 버리지 않는다면, 정말 할 수 있겠나?

음악의 신들과 함께 변화는 시작되었다.

title.en: "SHOPSKILL" Sae Areba, Dungeon ka Sita Sekaidemo Rakusyou da: Hakugai Sareta Shounen no Saikyou Zamaa Life

altTitles.ja: 『ショップ』スキルさえあれば、ダンジョン化した世界でも楽勝だ ～迫害された少年の最強ざまぁライフ～

altTitles.es-la: Con mi Habilidad "Tienda", es Fácil Conquistar un Mundo de Mazmorras.

altTitles.en: As Long as I Have the [Shop] Skill, I'll Have an Easy Life Even in a World That Has Been Transformed Into a Dungeon!

altTitles.ja-ro: “Shop” Skill Sae Areba, Dungeon-ka Shita Sekai Demo Rakushou da

description.en: High school student Boji Nichiro is isolated from the rest of the world due to fierce bullying. One day, however, the world is transformed by the "dungeonisation" phenomenon! In the midst of the chaos, Nichiro awakens the unique skill "Shop". It was an out-of-the-box skill that allowed him to buy everything from food and daily necessities to unrealistic items! The start of a painful and "wacky" modern fantasy from "Shosetsu-kaerou"!
description.ja: 壮絶なイジメを受け、孤立していた高校生・坊地日呂。だが、ある日《ダンジョン化》現象により世界は一変する！　混乱の中、日呂に覚醒したユニークスキル『ショップ』。それは、食料や日用品から非現実的なアイテムまでなんでも買える規格外のスキルだった――！　“小説家になろう”発痛快“ざまぁ”の現代ファンタジー開幕!!
description.es-la: Hiro es un estudiante que no confía en nadie. Él se ve envuelto en una catastrofe mundial. La aparición de monstruos convirtió al mundo en una mazmorra y Hiro tendrá que usar su nueva habilidad para sobrevivir.
